hero.eyebrow: Technology Lead • Creative Technologist • Software Developer
hero.title: Courtney Ring

about.title: About Me
about.paragraph: Hi there! I'm Courtney, a creative technologist based in New York City. I've worked in the tech industry for seven years with roles in both software development and technology leadership. This background gives me the perfect combination of skills to be the bridge between design and technology. I can be the digital expert during the ideation process, the prototyper during discovery, and the point person during project development. I thrive on figuring out new solutions and tinkering with gadgets to ultimately deliver experiences to users that give them the true surprise-and-delight moment.
